test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Load and Navigation to Search Results
steps: Verify the homepage loads successfully (logo, search bar, key elements visible)
Enter a destination in the 'Where' field (e.g., 'Paris')
Select a date range for check-in and check-out (e.g., next weekend)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays with listings related to 'Paris' for the selected date range.

test_scenarios.name: Book a Property (Happy Path)
steps: Navigate to search results (pre-condition: successful search as in previous test)
Select a listing from the search results.
Verify property details are loaded correctly.
Fill in guest details and payment info.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Booking confirmation page is displayed with booking details and a confirmation number.  An email confirmation is sent to the user's registered email address.
